description: We’ve pulled some photos from group stage games and made one very important change — we removed the ball. See if you can guess where it was.
title: The New York Times
title_page: Spot the Ball - The New York Times
maintext:
By SCOTT BLUMENTHAL, ALASTAIR COOTE, SAM MANCHESTER and RUMSEY TAYLOR
We're a week and a half into the 2018 World Cup, which means everybody out there has watched plenty of soccer, right? We've pulled some photos from group stage games and made one very important change — we removed the ball. See if you can guess where it was.
